__e: I have a great girlfriend and I am really happy, and when you dumped me for that jackass, I thought I'd never be happy again.
She seemed like a great girl, but on the bright side, in all your years on this planet, has anyone ever dumped you for working too hard?
- I've left him for good this time, so you and me can have fun.
Maybe she dumped you and forgot to tell you.
It happened about five times in a row and I became fed up with life so I dropped everything, shut people out and am barely alive.
I mean, I'm now dumped and homeless...
You mean to the site where you dropped the bomb, to the school?
The woman of my dreams dumped me the day before our wedding... for guys that wear blue makeup.
Might help us figure out who dumped the victim in the cemetery.
